title: How do I check refined labels?
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**

Please state your operating system, env, and which version of DeepLabCut you are using.
Example: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut1.x or 2.x.

Please complete the following information about your system:

OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
DeepLabCut Version 2.0.8
Browser safari


**Describe the problem**

after extracting outlier frames i go for refine label step and relabel the frames that are misplaced on the body part. i load the frames and try to label it and after saving it if i again check those labels they go back to their previous position as if the changes made by me did not get saved 

**How to Reproduce the problem**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to step deeplabcut.refine_labels(config_path)
2. Click on load labels
3. click OK on the user instructions window 
4. click OK to the threshold value entered as 0.1
5. start correcting the labels on every image and save it 
6. then I again check the corrected labels for same images by loading them ,find the same issue i.e misplaced dots on the body parts


**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.


**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
 hope i may able to explain my problem this time
